title: Dragonskin cloak
data:
{{version031}}
{{flavour|An opalescent cloak gleaming with the colours of all kinds of dragons. It imbues the wearer with draconic resistances, although somewhat unreliably.}}
[[File:New dragonskin.png]] '''''the +4 dragonskin cloak'''''

+4 [[cloak]]

Each time the wearer takes damage from one of the following elements, there is a 50% chance to temporarily receive one rank of resistance against it:
*[[Fire]]
*[[Steam]]
*[[Cold]]
*[[Electricity]]
*[[Poison]]
*[[Acid]]
*[[Negative energy]]

==Desirability==
The '''dragonskin cloak'''<ref>{{source ref|0.30.1|art-data.txt|1251}}</ref> can only be acquired by killing [[Tiamat]]. It has a great [[enchant]]ment and ''occasionally'' gives you resistance to virtually any element. Against serious elemental threats, don't rely on this cloak as your only resistance; taking multiple unresisted attacks from an [[orb of fire]] stings. Regardless, if you can kill Tiamat, it's a very nice cloak - if only for the AC.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.25]], the dragonskin cloak occasionally provided resistance to [[Sticky Flame]] instead of [[acid]].
*The dragonskin cloak was added in [[0.10]].
